summary: An email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting a previously written memo on the Epstein case for reference on format, length, and style, indicating renewed assignment to prepare a DAG memo.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, requesting a previously written memo on Epstein for guidance on preparing a DAG memo.

events.title: Request for Epstein Memo
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails a request for a previously written document on the Epstein case to assist in preparing a DAG memo, noting the assignment is back on.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York was assigned to write a DAG memo on Epstein, an assignment described as 'on-again / off-again / on-again'.
The attorney requested a previously written document on the Epstein case for reference on format, length, and style.
The email suggests the existence of prior internal documentation or memos regarding the Epstein case within the U.S. Attorney's office.
